page.title: 06LITTLE WITLEY HOMELIFE-1
page.content: { Occupations}represented locally are surprisingly diverse. Farmers, accountants, solicitors, teachers, industrial and commercial specialists, both retired and working, live as neighbours.{Home improvements}have fashioned tastefully renovated properties with double garages and well kept gardens, all different and private, yet all run traditionally. The{typical home}is owned by a married couple with mortgage, children and pets. The major income is contributed by the male who may drive 20,000 miles/year in his working life so that the family can enjoy rural living. {Health awareness}influences weekly menus.Vegetarian meals, pasta, curry, brown rice and brown bread are eaten regularly. Home freezing of vegetables and home-made preserves are common.
